channel.title: Save On The Ray Ban RX5169
channel.description: Ray-Ban was the offshoot brand of German eye wear manufacturers Bausch & Lomb. Started in 1937, the company was created to respond to the needs of US Air Force pilots. A Lieutenant in the Air Force called John Macready went to Bausch & Lomb and requested sunglasses to be made that would protect his eyes [...]

item.title: Save On The Ray Ban RX5169
item.description:
Ray-Ban was the offshoot brand of German eye wear manufacturers Bausch & Lomb. Started in 1937, the company was created to respond to the needs of US Air Force pilots. A Lieutenant in the Air Force called John Macready went to Bausch & Lomb and requested sunglasses to be made that would protect his eyes [...]
